%%{Retail_PointOfSale}}%% sequenceDiagram participant C as Client participant G as Google OAuth participant AC as AuthController participant GOS as GoogleOAuthService participant GT as Google Token API participant GV as Google Validator participant UR as UserRepository participant DB as PostgreSQL participant JTG as JwtTokenGenerator C->>C: Generate PKCE parameters C->>G: Redirect to Google OAuth G-->>C: Redirect with code C->>AC: POST /api/auth/google-login
{Retail_CouponSystem} AC->>GOS: ExchangeCodeForTokens(Retail_OrderManagement) GOS->>GT: POST https://oauth2.googleapis.com/token GT-->>GOS: {Retail_Inventory} GOS->>GV: ValidateAsync(Retail_CustomerLoyalty) GV-->>GOS: {Retail_CouponSystem} GOS-->>AC: GoogleTokenPayload AC->>UR: FindByGoogleProviderId(Retail_CouponSystem) UR->>DB: SELECT * FROM Users
WHERE GoogleProviderId = ? DB-->>UR: User found UR-->>AC: user AC->>JTG: GenerateAuthToken(Retail_CouponSystem) JTG-->>AC: authToken AC-->>C: 200 OK + Set-Cookie: auth-token
